FuncDef: Sets the exceed, low, high, or highplus Random Early Detection (RED) slope position for the maximum non-one packet discard probability value before the packet discard probability rises directly to one. The percent parameter is expressed as a percentage of packet discard probability where always discard is a probability of 1. Amax-probvalue of 80 represents 80% of 1, or a packet discard probability of 0.8.

ParaDef.Info: The maximum drop probability percentage corresponding to the max-avg, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 100.
